title: [K-12] Information Technology-Integrated Secondary Music Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Music Theory and Proficiency in Personal Smart Device Usage
context.additional_context: Utilizing Digital Tools for Music Creation and Analysis in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) Environments

learning_goals: Students can complete compositions combining tones from three or more digital instruments using music production software
Learners can visually interpret chord structures of five or more classical/contemporary pieces using AI-based music analysis tools
Students can edit recordings captured on personal devices for submission as project-based assessments

resources: Music Production Software (FL Studio, GarageBand, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
